references.formattedCitation: Kiesling, Brady. ToposText – a Reference Tool for Greek Civilization. Version 2.0. Aikaterini Laskaridis Foundation, 2016. https://topostext.org/.

description: Hybla Gereatis was an ancient settlement in Sicily located on the slopes of Mount Etna. Its remains are located near Paternò, Sicily.
